name: Girafarig
description: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
